title: SRFTI Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Medical Officer Posts
description: The Satyajit Ray Film & Television Institute (SRFTI) has announced the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the 02 vacancies for Medical Officer Posts. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS can apply for the SRFTI Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible aspirants can fill out the application form on or before the last date of applicatio...
